abstract_ssm: Collection contains nine photographic portraits of the Wilson and Lawson families, including three tintypes, dating from 1876 to 1896. Family members depicted in the photographs include Christine Smith Lawson, Georgia Lawson, Sarah Lawson, Florence (Wilson) Stowell, Annie Thoma, Dr. Charles H. Wilson, Mrs. Charles H. Wilson (nee Rockwell, later Mrs. Welder), Malvina S. (Lawson) Wilson, and Mary Elizabeth Wilson. Both families resided in Brooklyn, New York.
